resources.string: Are you sure want to delete the whole favorite list?
Have you done learning Hanyu 4? Get Hanyu 5 on Playstore and take your Chinese to another level.
[in sentences beginning with a place world, added to the verb to indicate a resultant state, the verb plus 着 having the force of “there is”]
have a holiday; have a day off
end of a term or semester
measure word for paragraph or passage
interesting or pleasant to listen to
be able to; be capable of; possibly
take good care of; cherish; treasure
ache; have a pain; be sore
[measure word for a set of something]
How many students does the school have?
The school has four hundred and eight students.
This dress is one hundred and ninety-eight yuan.
There are two books on the table.
A dozen passengers sat on the bus.
There are totally 408 students and 50 teachers in our school. There is a teaching building in the school, and there are many bright classrooms in the teaching building.
Every day, we read and write in the classroom. There is a playground in front of the teaching building, and many trees are planted in the back. We often do activities under the trees.
Xiaohong started learning to play the piano at the age of six.
The school will be closed from the 10th.
In the final exam, he was the first in our class.

On the first day of school, two new students came to our class. The teacher said: \"Li Qiang and Zhang Yan are new students in our class. Li Qiang is from Shanghai and Zhang Yan is from Xi\'an. Starting today, there are 32 students in our class.\"
We are very happy and applaud together to welcome the new students. Starting today, we have two new friends!
Before class, we do our homework.
Before eating, we wash our hands.
A month ago, he was on a business trip in Xi\'an.
After class, I go to the playground to play basketball.
After get off work, my mother went to the market to buy vegetables.
After growing up, I plan to go to China to learn Chinese.
Grandpa used to be a pilot.
Li Qiang used to like to drink milk.
Teacher Chen used to teach mathematics.
This semester, Teacher Chen taught us Chinese class. Before class, we preview new words and texts. In class, we listened carefully to the teacher\'s lecture.

After class, we often chat with the teacher in Chinese to discuss problems. After school, we carefully reviewed our homework. Everyone is making rapid progress. Teacher Chen praised us: \"You are really good students who study hard!\"
This text is very interesting, you should read it.
This dress is beautiful, you should try it.
This comic is very good, you should take a look.
A man went to a shoe store to buy shoes. Before going out, he measured his feet with the rope and made a mark on the rope.
After arriving at the shoe store, he touched his pocket and said, \"Oh, I forgot to get the rope!\" When he took the rope and went back to the shoe store, the shoe store was already closed.
When he got home, he told his wife about it. The wife was very angry and said, \"Why don\'t you try the shoes yourself?\"

Mother Bird has two children, the elder sister is smart and the younger one is stupid. They learn to fly together. Elder sister thinks she is very smart and doesn\'t need to study hard. Younger sister works very hard, and gets up every day to practice.

Ten days later, mother bird let them race, and elder sister was the first to fly, and soon she couldn\'t fly. The mother asked the younger sister: \"Are you okay?\" The sister said, \"I\'ll try it!\" She flew and flew, and soon flew far away. The mother asked the elder sister, \"Why don\'t you learn from your sister?\"
Mom: How many students are in your class?
Xiaohua: Thirty-four before, now thirty-six, there are two new classmates.
Mom: Where did they all come from?
Xiaohua: They are all from China.
Mom: In the future, you can practice Chinese with them more.
Can you look up a dictionary?
My sister can\'t tie her shoelaces.

The beautiful bird can sing, her singing is so pleasant, and every day she sings to the animals. One day, she asked everyone, \"Can you sing?\" The elephant replied, \"I can\'t sing, I can move wood.\"
The little duck said: \"I can\'t sing, I can swim. Little bird, can you swim?\" The little bird said, \"I can\'t swim. Everyone has their own skills.\"
We are going to go hiking on the weekend.
The teacher has a meeting in the afternoon.
My brother wants to be a doctor.
I want to go to China.
My friend wants to learn Chinese.
My sister doesn\'t want to take medicine.
My brother doesn\'t want to take pictures.
I don\'t want to drink tea, I want to drink juice.

Tomorrow is Sunday, Xiao Ming\'s teacher is going to take the students to climb the mountain. Xiaoming said to his mother: \"Tomorrow we are going to climb the mountain. The teacher asked us to bring lunch.\" Mom asked Xiaoming: \"What do you want to bring? Do you want to eat hamburgers?\"
Xiao Ming said, \"I don\'t want to eat hamburgers, I want to eat fried rice.\" Mom said, \"Okay, I\'ll prepare it for you. Don\'t forget to bring a water bottle.\"
Can I go to the airport with you?
Can\'t eat sugar before going to bed.
Cell phones are not allowed on the plane.
I take a shower after playing ball.
I watch TV after taking a shower.
I go to bed after watching TV.
Xiaohua is a cartoon fan. After school, Xiaohua asked her mother, \"Mom, can I watch TV?\" The mother shook her head and said, \"You can\'t watch it now. Do it after finishing my homework.\"

Xiaohua said: \"I can do my homework after watching TV?\" Mom said: \"Why?\" Xiaohua said: \"The cartoon \"Monkey King\" at 6 o\'clock, I heard it is very interesting, I want to watch it very much.\" Mom nodded and said, \"Okay.\"
Xiao Li is in the classroom.
The teacher is outside the classroom.
My sister is between me and my brother.
You can see many animals in the zoo.
You can meet many new friends at school.
My younger brother likes to swing on the swing.

On Sunday, I went to Xiaoling\'s house to play. Xiaoling\'s home is near Chinatown. There are many shops and restaurants in Chinatown, which is very lively. There is a station in front of Chinatown, next to the station is a Chinese restaurant.
Xiaoling\'s home is next to the Chinese restaurant. You can buy a lot of Chinese stuff in Chinatown. I like Chinese knots the most. I gave Xiaoling a beautiful Chinese knot.

Before going to bed, Xiao Ming wants to eat a piece of candy. He asked his mother: \"Can I eat candy?\" The mother said: \"No, this is a bad habit. If you eat before going to bed, your teeth will grow bugs.\"
Xiao Ming asked: \"Does it hurt?\" Mom nodded and said, \"It hurts, of course it hurts.\" Xiao Ming said, \"Okay, I won\'t eat it.\"
Xiaohua: Mom, can I surf the Internet? I want to play games.
Mom: You can\'t surf the Internet now. It\'s nine o\'clock. Go to bed.
Xiaohua: Well, I\'m going to bed.
Mom: Don\'t forget to brush your teeth before going to bed.
On Monday, Xiaohua didn\'t go to school, he caught a cold. When his mother took him to the hospital, Xiaohua said to the doctor, \"I have a headache, a cough, and a sore throat.\"

After examining Xiaohua, the doctor said, \"You have a fever. It\'s winter now, and the weather is cold. You need to wear more clothes and drink more water.\" The doctor asked Xiaohua to take medicine on time and rest more. Three days later, Xiaohua\'s illness was cured.
The younger brother did ten questions.
Dad bought a pair of glasses.
Did your sister send a letter?
Did your brother do any questions?
My sister didn\'t send a letter.
The younger brother didn\'t do the question.
Mom bought a lot of fresh apples.
Xiao Li picked out the biggest apple and handed it to Xiao Ming, and said, \"Brother, you eat first.\" Xiao Ming waved his hand and said to Xiao Li, \"You are the younger sister, you eat first.\"
When Xiaohua saw it, he said: \"Mom and Dad are the hardest, they should eat first.\" Mom and Dad listened to their words, smiled and said, \"You are all polite and good children!\"
My brother is going to be late.
The animation is about to start.
My sister is about to start high school.
My uncle is getting married next year.
School will be closed in a month.

The new year is coming, and the students are sending New Year cards to each other. Xiaohua also wants to make some New Year cards for teachers and classmates. He prepared colored paper, paintbrushes, glue and scissors.
After finishing his homework, he started to do it. He made a lot of greeting cards and wrote a lot of blessings on the cards. He wished the teacher good health and a happy new year to the students!
While Xiaohua was doing her homework, her mother was mopping the floor.
While my brother was playing basketball, my younger brother was reading the text.
Xiaohua was writing a New Year\'s card while Dad was watching TV.
When Xiao Ming was playing games with the children, the sun was about to set. He hurriedly shouted: \"Father Sun, don\'t go! If you leave, we can\'t play!\"
Father Sun said, \"Goodbye, little ones! There are many children on the other side of the earth. They were sleeping when you were playing outside. I\'m going to wake them up.\"
Xiao Ming said: \"Okay, Mr. Sun. Please come and call me tomorrow morning to get up.\"
The rooster was walking on the road when he met a wolf. When the wolf saw the rooster, he was very happy, and he thought: \"I was just about to eat a chicken.\"

The wolf asked: \"good friend, where are you going?\" The rooster said: \"I\'m going to see my friend.\" The wolf said: \"I\'ll go with you.\" The rooster thought: Oops, he wants to eat me, I can\'t be fooled by him! The rooster said to the wolf, \"I\'m sorry, there is a dog behind me, and I\'m waiting for him.\"
The wolf listened to the rooster and ran away.
Wolf: I haven\'t eaten for a day, I\'m so hungry!
Rooster: rooster, rooster is so beautiful, smart, beautiful I\'m number one!
Wolf: Ah, what a huge chicken! I was just about to eat chicken, haha… good friend, where are you going?
Rooster: I\'m going to see the little goat.
Wolf: Great! I was going to see him too, let\'s go together!
Rooster: What does he want to do? Does he want to eat me? I\'ll think about it…
Rooster: I\'m sorry, I\'m waiting for my friend, he\'s coming.
Wolf: Ah? Then I\'ll go first.
Rooster: rooster, rooster is so beautiful, smart, beautiful I\'m number one!
